medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began at approximately 7 PM last night and has worsened since then. Initially, the pain was diffuse and difficult to characterize. The patient also experienced two episodes of vomiting and feelings of dizziness after trying to swallow Pepto-Bismol and water. He notes right lower quadrant pain when urinating but denies dysuria and polyuria. He reports having passed flatus but is unsure, and he denies recent diarrhea and constipation.
medical_history.family_history: Negative for IBD, cancer, cardiac disease, and bleeding disorders.
